# HKQueryAnchor

**Class**

An object used to identify all the samples previously returned by an anchored object query.

## Declaration

```swift
class HKQueryAnchor
```

## Overview

The system returns [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQueryAnchor] objects in both the anchored object query’s results handler and it’s update handler. Use the anchors to query for samples added or deleted after the result or update.

## Creating Anchor Objects

- **init(fromValue:)**: Returns an anchor object from the provided anchor value.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
